title: Disturbing CNN Tapes | Guests: Christopher Rufo & Vernon Jones | 12/2/20
description:
Joe Biden’s pet psychic “joins” Glenn to unveil the vision she received while reading Biden’s palms. An article in the New York Times claimed Biden will be the first modern president facing claims of illegitimacy. Project Veritas released disturbing tapes from CNN’s editorial meetings. A truck driver delivering ballots alleges possible fraud. Georgia state Rep. Vernon Jones warns how critical the Senate runoff races are for Republicans. BlazeTV host Kevin Freeman discusses Biden’s Cabinet picks and a possible crash of the dollar. City Journal contributing editor Christopher Rufo talks Biden’s promise to bring back critical race theory trainings. The media reports “Elliot Page” is transgender without noting it’s Ellen Page.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
